title: Bad image league of legends
body:
C:\Riot Games\League Of Legends\libscrypto-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f

I've been having this problem for a while now, i have absolutely no idea what to do, i've reinstalled the game 2 times and also repaired it. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Did you [reinstall the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)? or just delete and reinstall it?
I uninstalled it with control panel and then using the leagueoflegends_OC1_Installer to install it back onto my computer.

Hey there,

Sorry I didn't get back to you sooner. When reinstalling the game, are you just double clicking on the install file?

Could you try uninstalling the game once again and then when attempting to reinstall, right click the installer and select "Run as Administrator", it is possible there is a security setting on your PC preventing the installer from setting up all files needed for the game to run.
Thanks but i already solved the problem, all i did was take libscrypto-1_1.dll from a friends computer and place the file into mine.
